articles.description: Listen to BBC Radio Wales or BBC Radio Cymru commentary and follow text updates as Wales face Latvia in Euro 2024 qualifying.
articles.title: Euro 2024 qualifying: Latvia 0-0 Wales - live radio and text

articles.description: Juventus midfielder Paul Pogba is provisionally suspended from playing because of an anti-doping offence.
articles.title: Pogba provisionally suspended for anti-doping offence

articles.description: A Spanish high court judge opens an investigation into former Spanish FA president Luis Rubiales over Jenni Hermoso kiss.
articles.title: Judge opens investigation into Rubiales kiss

articles.description: The oldest fixture in international football throws up all sorts of intrigue 150 years on from their first encounter.
articles.title: Auld rivalries renewed as Scotland face England

articles.description: Novak Djokovic has equalled Margaret Court's all-time record of 24 Grand Slam singles titles - but how many more will he win?
articles.title: 'One of sport's biggest achievements' - and Djokovic eyes more

articles.description: Watch all the best action from week one of the new NFL season as Tyreek Hill stars for the Dolphins, Christian McCaffrey runs in a spectacular touchdown for the 49ers and the Jaguars' Zay Jones completes an incredible catch.
articles.title: Jones' one-handed touchdown catch leads NFL best plays

articles.description: England boss Gareth Southgate says he did not want to be "too harsh" on his players after the 1-1 draw against Ukraine.
articles.title: Southgate 'not too harsh' on players after draw

articles.description: England defender Conor Coady backs the selection of "mainstay" Harry Maguire by boss Gareth Southgate.
articles.title: 'Mainstay' Maguire deserved England selection - Coady

articles.description: Scotland did not "show a true reflection" of themselves after being dominated by South Africa in their Rugby World Cup opener, says Finn Russell.
articles.title: South Africa loss not true reflection of Scots - Russell

articles.description: Not even the Wales and Fiji players could quite comprehend the stunning spectacle we witnessed in Stade de Bordeaux on a sweltering Sunday night.
articles.title: Night of drama unfolds in the battle of Bordeaux
